text: Dial M for Murder is an American 1954 crime drama movie. It was directed by Alfred Hitchcock. The movie is about a plot to murder. Grace Kelly plays Margot. Ray Milland plays Tony. The movie performed very well at the box office. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:Thriller movies Category:1950s crime drama movies Category:1954 crime movies Category:1954 drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Alfred Hitchcock
title: Dial M for Murder
